ai-tika-s0403t22:1_0: Someone gathers first to the household and colorful.
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_2: If she sits down in private alone with a woman, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_4: If he sits down in private on a concealed seat with a woman, and he then sits down in private on a concealed seat suitable for action, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_5: gives a teaching of more than five or six sentences to a woman: ‘This is in the presence of a man who understands.’
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_6: That is how I understand offenses.’
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_7: That’s why I should understand the training.’
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_8: The sixth section on the back of the sexual intercourse.
ai-tika-s0403t22:3_0: The first section for recitation on the rivers is finished.
ai-tika-s0403t22:4_0: The section on Dīgha Tapassī is finished.
ai-tika-s0403t22:5_0: Right away, thinking, “Take the fourth part of the day.
ai-tika-s0403t22:6_0: So there are mansions for the Nuns
ai-tika-s0403t22:7_0: The Book of the Fives is finished.
ai-tika-s0403t22:8_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
